files.name: main.py
files.content:
StartNum=input ("Starting number?")
EndNum=input ("Ending number?")

StartNum= int(StartNum)
EndNum = int(EndNum)

while (True):
    if (EndNum>StartNum):
        break
    else:
        print ("Ending number must be greater than", StartNum)
        EndNum= int (input ("Ending number?"))
        continue

total=0
for x in range (StartNum, EndNum+1):
    total= ( total + x )
    
print ("")
print ("The sum of numbers from", StartNum, "to", EndNum, "is", total)
